title: 2 1/2 = Two-and-a-half
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Tom Daly and Brian Pearce
brief_description: A revealing study of two two-and-a-half year old children at play indoors on a winter afternoon, without adult surveillance or interference. Records every playful antic, every friction, and every laughing word or sound of protest.
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Tom Daly and Brian Pearce
